typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Column_1 as string,
		Column_2 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> MyCSVSource
MyCSVSource sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['SampleOutput'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	saveOrder: 1,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> MycsvDestination
